description:
time: change float expression to ensure it is an integer

When I increased the number of bits that gccgo uses for
untyped floats, the expression 0.52*1e9 was no longer
integral.  This patch fixes that.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=21264793e00f ***

time: change float expression to ensure it is an integer

When I increased the number of bits that gccgo uses for
untyped floats, the expression 0.52*1e9 was no longer
integral.  This patch fixes that.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6113043

subject: code review 6113043: time: change float expression to ensure it is an integer
